level.description: The Robot Priority Assigner is ready for debugging. Use the <color=#ffff00ff>ACTIVATOR</color> tool to check the priorities array. Figure out where the bug is and use the BUGCATCHER to catch it.
level.introtext: The final version of the Assigner sorts all numbers. Can you figure out what is wrong this time?
level.endtext: All the bugs have been found. You've fixed the Priority Assigner!
